comments.text: Got a motorbike taxi here from kathmandu to escape the urban hell. Paid 500 npr (€3) via the in drive app. Pretty grim getting sprayed with dirt. While I was walking along the road writing a sign a kind dude on a motorbike stopped and offered me a ride (free of charge) further down the road. He spoke great english, what a legend!
Quite a few cars passed but they're crammed bush taxis and wouldn't stop. Eventually got picked up by a very very slow truck. Limited english but good fun.
